description: This course is for experienced studio and art history students and those interested in contemporary theory. Students directly encounter art and new theory, explore art criticism (in part through practicing it) and learn about ethics to help think about value judgments. Recommended for students contemplating art history or studio graduate work. Prerequisite: completion of BTS-T.
name: Issues Art Criticism
notes: Prerequisite: Completion of BTS-T requirement. Open to Juniors and Seniors only.
title: Issues in Art Criticism
